function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures.","Impact":"Reversal or delay of environmental protection measures, leading to increased environmental impact and risk of ecological damage.","Mitigation":"Urgent advocacy for the continuation and enforcement of environmental protection policies alongside economic revitalization efforts.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies for real-time assessment of ecological impact.","People":"Environmental advocates, conservation organizations, and policymakers.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, conservation organizations, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies.","Impact":"Delayed progress in mitigating climate change and biodiversity loss due to underinvestment in sustainable energy development.","Mitigation":"Allocation of recovery funds towards forward-looking objectives and innovative green technology, alongside incumbent industry support.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies such as solar, wind, and hydroelectric power.","People":"Environmentalists, green energy developers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Environmental organizations, research institutions, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development.","Impact":"Failure to meet Paris Agreement objectives and insufficient progress in mitigating climate change.","Mitigation":"Accountability and transparency in the allocation of global recovery funds, with a focus on directing investments towards sustainable energy development.","Technologies":"Financial tracking and auditing technologies for monitoring the allocation of recovery funds.","People":"Financial regulators, environmental advocates, and policymakers.","Owner":"Financial oversight bodies, environmental organizations, and government agencies."}]}
